extendedInfo.description: Beware the hole! Based on the popular Japanese game show, Hole in the Wall pits players against various moving wall obstacles in which he conforms his body to get through! But look out! If you fail to match the hole in the wall you ll get shoved into the water below! Challenge yourself in a Single Player TV Season or compete against teams across the nation! Hole in the Wall isn t meant to be fair; it s meant to be a-hole-lot-of-fun!â¢	Fun, frantic action and challenging holes in the wall! â¢	Challenge mode that pits the player against all the obstacles the game has with the goal of reaching a high score.â¢	Fully customizable characters that add to the fun during Gameplay! â¢	Multiple game modes that will up the challenge for you AND a friend.
